4. Compare the attendance for North Melbourne with all other teams' home attendances to check if it's the lowest. In this table, every other team has a higher attendance than North Melbourne (12800).

5. Since the attendance for North Melbourne is lower than all other home teams in this table, we can conclude that North Melbourne was indeed the home team where the attendance was lowest.
